name: Salomon Shift Pro 130 AT Ski Boots - Men's
description: Power and stability meet versatililty, these boots shift from in bounds groomers to backcountry tours with ease. The highly customizable Custom Shell HD and liner can be thermo-moulded to fit your foot perfectly. The GripWalk soles and Surelock mechanism provide traction and range of motion when in walk mode. Great for high speed shredders who want one boot for where ever they go.Polyamide shell with XeCarb carbon fibre framing transfers power efficiently to your ski.Sensifit inserts for easy step-in.Cuff is Polyolefin and polyamide for stability and ideal flex.Shell and seamless liner can be thermo-moulded for personalized performance.4 aluminum micro-adjust buckles secure your foot in a snug fit.45 mm strap adds extra support at the top of the cuff.Adjustable flex lets you tweak the boot's stiffness.Oversized pivot transfers power smoothly.Grip Walk soles allow nearly-normal walking with a rockered design.Contagrip rubber between heel and toe for grip in rocky terrain.Compatible with tech bindings, WTR bindings, GripWalk bindings and MNC bindings.
